Question.Subject: Cannot access ubisoft.com or any other ubi sites?
Question.Content: for some reason i cant access ubi sites and even if i do if i click anything it says page cannot be displayed on almost everything i click even forums. wtf's wrong? tried internet explorer, firefox and safari, it wont open in any
Question.ChosenAnswer:
It looks like there is a redirect on that page that is broken.
Try www.ubi.com/enca/ instead
If you still have problems, it's likely that pirates are maliciously attacking ubi servers due to the unpopular decision to make new games unplayable unless you have a good online connection with their servers.

Answer.Content:
It looks like there is a redirect on that page that is broken.
Try www.ubi.com/enca/ instead
If you still have problems, it's likely that pirates are maliciously attacking ubi servers due to the unpopular decision to make new games unplayable unless you have a good online connection with their servers.
Try using a proxy server, and do the click things again . see if the error pups up again. if it doesn't then there is something wrong about your internet ip address location, service or etc.
